Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Board Class contains all parts defining the playing board for each Player.

Attributes:

  • ResourceManager "resourceManager" contains both the Warehouse and the Strongbox
  • DevelopmentCardSlots "developmentCardSlots" contains all three Development Card slots on the player's board
  • LeaderCard[] "leaderCards": contains both leader cards owned by the player
  • BasicProduction "basicProduction": defines the basic production power of the player's board
See Also:

    • productionInputAdder

      public ResourceStack productionInputAdder​(java.util.ArrayList<DevelopmentCard> developmentCards, java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> leaderCards, boolean wantsBasicProduction, java.util.ArrayList<ResourceType> inputs) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Counts input resources of the Production.
      Parameters:
      developmentCards - Cards chosen to activate production.
      leaderCards - Leader Cards chosen to activate production.
      wantsBasicProduction - True if the player wants to activate the basic production.
      inputs - All inputs of the basic production.
      Returns:
      A stack containing all inputs.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • canStartProduction

      public boolean canStartProduction​(java.util.ArrayList<DevelopmentCard> developmentCards, java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> leaderCards, boolean wantsBasicProduction, java.util.ArrayList<ResourceType> inputs)
      Checks if the player has enough resources to start a production.
      Parameters:
      developmentCards - Cards chosen to activate production.
      leaderCards - Leader Cards chosen to activate production.
      wantsBasicProduction - True if the player wants to activate the basic production.
      inputs - All inputs of the basic production.
      Returns:
      True if the player can start the Production.

    • getFixedProductionOutput

      public ResourceStack getFixedProductionOutput​(Player player, java.util.ArrayList<DevelopmentCard> developmentCards, java.util.ArrayList<LeaderCard> leaderCards, boolean wantsBasicProduction) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Gets the total output of non-choosable outputs of the Production.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who started a Production (to get faith points).
      developmentCards - Cards chosen to activate production.
      leaderCards - Leader Cards chosen to activate production.
      wantsBasicProduction - True if the player wants to activate the basic production.
      Returns:
      ResourceStack containing total non-choosable output of the Production.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Checks if the player can activate a given leaderCard (checks both Resources and Cards).
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      True if the card can be activated.
